item.dc:creator: @Duky190 Duky190
item.description:
@Duky190 wrote:

Im still kinda new to java but i got the points system to work and the counter to work, i also got the monsters to give points. But every time i try to buy something from the shop it says you dont have enough points even when u do. Help? Also i added the point values to the items.

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT][Project Insanity] Adding Point System + More![TUT]
item.dc:creator: @drachtpkz123 drachtpkz123

@drachtpkz123 wrote:

you made if the npc drops items then you getting points??
or im wrong.

Loli was repping you but you already got 200,

item.title: [TUT][Project Insanity] Adding Point System + More![TUT]
item.dc:creator: @javaCCPlusPlusCSharp javaCCPlusPlusCSharp
item.description:
@javaCCPlusPlusCSharp wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Then don’t write them?

Hey bro, I am working on a tutorial for you, its going to be on how to get your finger out of your own arse

Some people may not know how to create their own tokens (Points)

For instance I was in need of my own point system’s for quests/ quest stages and other events in the game/ server and I was completely ignorant on Project Insanity having both Pest Control points and Player Kill Points.

Every tutorial has its own use just not for everyone…

Read full topic

item.title: [TUT][Project Insanity] Adding Point System + More![TUT]
item.dc:creator: @johnl17 johnl17
item.description:
@johnl17 wrote:

When ever i attempt to do this on PI it compiles. But when a player logouts or saves. it laggs them out, dumps all kinds of errors and malforms into the server cmd. And destroy’s “Wipes” there character file.

Read full topic
